resp = client.search(
    query={
        "boosting": {
            "positive": {
                "term": {
                    "text": "apple"
                }
            },
            "negative": {
                "term": {
                    "text": "pie tart fruit crumble tree"
                }
            },
            "negative_boost": 0.5
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
